N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 506.5 - Utilization review

State Regulations
(a) Part 511 of this Title authorizes the department to establish a
system for utilization review for specific provider types, including dental
services and supplies. Part 511 also describes the services and procedures
excluded from the utilization review for all provider service types. (b) General rule. The department will pay for
up to three dental service encounters in a benefit year. For purposes of this
section, each discrete visit to a dentist or to a dental clinic is one
encounter, regardless of the number of services provided or procedures
performed during the visit. Notes
